title: (+): Support SubtractAssetQuantity
body:
# What is this pull request?

Support SubtractAssetQuantity of iroha's CommandService.

# Why do you implement it? Why do we need this pull request?

In order to invoke the iroha's SubtractAssetQuantity command.

# How to use the features provided in the pull request?

Create a command with `Iroha.CommandService.subtractAssetQuantity' method, and send the transaction containing the command.

title: Hotfix/upgrade sbt-pgp
body: Failed to fetch the old version of sbt-pgp in our build pipeline.

title: (+) Update domain validator as RFC1305.
body:
# What is this pull request?
Add a validator to validate domain name as RFC1305.

# Why do you implement it? Why do we need this pull request?
Old implementation that regex validator was insufficient.

title: (+)Add a learning test for the behavior of tx_counter
body:
# What is this pull request?

Add a test to learn the behavior of tx_counter. We wanted to make sure we can submit a transaction with the same tx_counter.

# Why do you implement it? Why do we need this pull request?

A test case for checking the behavior of  iroha node when it receives transactions with the same tx_counter.

title: (~) Fix issue with account name validation.
body:
If account name start with number, the createAccount command will fail.

Signed-off-by: SHIMADA, Daisuke <dice.k1984@gmail.com>

title: (~) Refactoring test code.
body:
Separate generation of command and transaction.

Signed-off-by: SHIMADA, Daisuke <dice.k1984@gmail.com>

title: (+) Update Ed25519 usage for iroha v1.
body:
1. Changed ed25519 hash algorithm to SHA3-512.

SHA3EdDSAPrivateKeySpec is override class to use SHA3-512 as hash algorithm in Java8.

iroha v1 is change from SHA-512 to SHA3-512.

But it cannot get SHA3 instance by MessageDigest.getInstance in Java8.

And I didn't want to use Java9 because several dependencies.

So I created SHA3EdDSAPrivateKeySpec.

2. Updated proto files for iroha v1.

3. Updated validations for iroha v1.

Signed-off-by: SHIMADA, Daisuke <dice.k1984@gmail.com>

title: Feature/get transaction status
body:
# What is this pull request?

Support asking transaction's status to Iroha's CommandService.

# Why do you implement it? Why do we need this pull request?

Iroha clients need to know the status of their transaction request.

# How to use the features provided in the pull request?

Compute the hash of a transaction with `Iroha.CommandService.txHash`.  Ask Iroha's CommandService with the hash.
